title: Who is a better actor between Pankaj Tripathi and Manoj Vajpayee, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: We are comparing legends here . So it is difficult to say one of them is better than the other. Both Pankaj Tripathi and Manoj Bajpayee mostly do character roles and have received critical acclaim for their performances. They have their individual styles,but represent the art house genre of Bollywood films. Unfortunately,both have been sidelined by more popular actors. So both are great in terms of their acting skills. My wish is to see them together in a film,pitted against each other.

None of them. Yes, you read it correctly. Neither Manoj Bajpayee or Pankaj Tripathi can come up to the level of acting and stellar performance delivered by this guy……  Presenting to you, the one an only (drumroll)…… Kamaal Rashid Khan. Actor, director, producer, Youtuber, spot boy, light boy.
